intro: Laugeria densiflora, commonly known as the dense-flowered laugeria, is a member of the Rubiaceae family. It is a shrub characterized by its dense clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America. Laugeria densiflora is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest undergrowth.
